item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Girls Aloud Performances: SOTU, Life Got Cold, Jump, Long Hot Summer, etc
item.description:
Hi,

I am looking for any and all Girls Aloud performances, as close to HQ as possible. I am remastering as many as I am able to find and posting them on Youtube either in 1080 or 4K here, but I've gone through pretty much all I have, so I'm close to hitting a wall.

I am mainly looking for early performances of them, SOTU, NGA, Life Got Cold, Jump, Love Machine, See The Day, etc. Also looking for Something New on Strictly and on TOTP. I need TV performances, the ones from festivals, TV specials, DVDs, etc, I already have.

I am doing this for fun, so any help so I can keep doing it will be very much appreciated. Many thanks!
item.author: WalkingPrimrose24
